mapper.select: select P.user_id From Plan P JOIN Daily D ON P.plan_id = D.plan_id JOIN Review R ON R.daily_id = D.daily_id where R.review_id = #{reviewId};

SELECT r.review_id as reviewId, r.`order`, s.spot_id as spotId, s.name, s.type1 as category, s.type2 as type, s.x, s.y, r.contents, r.img FROM Daily d JOIN Review r ON d.daily_id = r.daily_id JOIN Spot s ON r.spot_id = s.spot_id WHERE d.plan_id = #{planId} and d.day_num = #{day};

select u.nick_name as userName, p.plan_id as planId, u.user_id as userId, p.title, `start` , `end`, p.created_at as createdAt, p.modified_at as modifiedAt, p.review_title as mainTitle, p.review_img as mainImg, p.review_contents as mainContents from Plan p JOIN Users u on p.user_id = u.user_id where p.plan_id = #{planId}
